longBusinessSummary: Ahren Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, asset acquisition, share exchange, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to identify and complete a business combination with a company fueled by deep technology and/or deep science. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
